messages.author: Sarah Miller
messages.text: Brainstorming the API rate limits for the v2 release. Thinking 1000 req/min?

messages.author: Mark Thompson
messages.text: 1000 seems high for our current DB capacity. Can we start at 500?

messages.author: Sarah Miller
messages.text: DECISION: We will set the v2 rate limit to 500 requests per minute for the initial launch.

messages.author: James Wilson
messages.text: The legacy auth service is failing under load. Total mess in there.

messages.author: Linda Garcia
messages.text: Agreed. Let's keep this internal, but we're basically patching it hourly until the migration.

messages.author: Robert Chen
messages.text: When is the 'Dark Mode' feature shipping?

messages.author: Emily Davis
messages.text: UPDATE: Design just pushed back. Moving 'Dark Mode' to Q2 for extra polish.

messages.author: Michael Brown
messages.text: What is the official policy on data retention for free-tier users?

messages.author: Jessica Taylor
messages.text: It is 30 days after account deactivation.

messages.author: Karen White
messages.text: Looking into it. Looks like a routing bug in the frontend.

messages.author: Karen White
messages.text: FIXED: Hotfix deployed at 09:45. Customers may need to refresh their browsers.

messages.author: David Lewis
messages.text: Can we give User_123 a refund even though they are past the 14-day window?

messages.author: Susan Walker
messages.text: The policy says no, but they are a high-value lead for sales.

messages.author: Susan Walker
messages.text: Let's make an exception this once, but don't document this as a change in general policy.
